sourcesContent:
import React from 'react';
import {
  List,
  Edit,
  Create,
  Datagrid,
  ReferenceArrayField,
  SingleFieldList,
  ChipField,
  TextField,
  EditButton,
  SimpleForm,
  TextInput
} from 'react-admin';

export const ResearcherList = props => (
  <List {...props}>
    <Datagrid>
      <TextField source="name" />
      <TextField source="email" />
      <ReferenceArrayField label="Groups" reference="groups" source="group_ids">
          <SingleFieldList>
              <ChipField source="name" />
          </SingleFieldList>
      </ReferenceArrayField>
      <EditButton />
    </Datagrid>
  </List>
);

export const ResearcherCreate = props => (
  <Create {...props}>
    <SimpleForm redirect="/groups">
      <TextInput source="name" />
      <TextInput source="email" type="email" />
      <TextInput source="password" type="password" />
      <TextInput source="type" value="researcher" disabled />
    </SimpleForm>
  </Create>
);

export const ResearcherEdit = props => (
  <Edit {...props}>
    <SimpleForm redirect="/groups">
      <TextInput source="name" />
      <TextInput source="email" type="email" />
      <TextInput source="password" type="password" />
      <TextInput source="type" value="researcher" disabled />
    </SimpleForm>
  </Edit>
);
